name: Eggs 1942
description: The Bad Eggs are mobilising their forces across the world. Join the Royal Egg Force and save the world with large scale eggy warfare.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 650M / Radeon R9 M375 or higher graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
